DOC.brief_summary: Background : study aim explore HIV positive patient ' perception toward illness treatment , association demographic clinical variable , particular adherence . Methods : study conduct outpatient clinic Infectious Disease University Hospital north Italy . Patients ask fill Illness Perception Questionnaire-Revised . Patient 's adherence measure : viral load ( HIV-RNA copies/ml ) presence check .
DOC.detailed_description: Data collection Participants recruit wait room , check visit blood test ; researcher explain aim study ask write informed consent participate . The accept patient ask fill Illness Perception Questionnaire Revised ( IPQ-R ) . Demographic , clinical adherence data also collect . Measures : 1 . Demographic clinical data : demographic information include age , gender , marital status , education , employment status , nationality . Clinical information , extract participant ' medical record , include : year diagnose HIV , patient history antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) , year therapy , presence fix dose combination antiretroviral drug , current therapeutic regimen 's type , total number pill per day , presence drug ' therapy , HIV acquisition risk . 2 . Illness representation : measure Italian validate version IPQ-R24 . The questionnaire divide three section : 1 ) disease identity ; 2 ) opinion 3 ) cause . While item disease identity dichotomous response ( yes/no ) , item regard opinion cause constitute 5 point Likert scale ( `` 1=completely disagree '' `` 5=completely agree '' ) . Identity section explore patient ' belief disease 's nature . Fourteen symptom list patient indicate experience since diagnosed disease , , believe symptom link disease . Opinions section compose 38 item explore , moment , patient perceive illness condition . Items group seven factor : 1 ) Timeline ( perception chronic v acute duration ) ; 2 ) Cyclical symptom ( perception cyclic v stable disease ) ; 3 ) Consequences ( perception disease serious physical , psychological social consequence patient ' life ) ; 4 ) Personal control ( perception action take effectively manage disease ) ; 5 ) Treatment control ( high low trust treatment efficacy ) ; 6 ) Coherence ( high low understanding disease ) ; 7 ) Emotional response ( prevalence negative emotion vs positive ) . Causes section list 18 possible illness cause patient rate level agreement item cause disease . 3 . Adherence index : measure HIV-RNA copies/ml presence check visit ( schedule every 3 month ) . Patients consider `` adherent '' case : undetectable viral load HIV-RNA < 40 copies/ml regular presence check visit ( ≤ 3 month ) . Adherence index collect patient treatment ( naïve patient patient therapy < 1 month exclude ) . Data analysis Descriptive statistic use demographic clinical characteristic , IPQ-R data adherence outcome . Data analyze use SPSS® version 21.0 Windows . Independent t-tests , one-way ANOVA LSD post hoc multiple comparison test Pearson correlational analysis use analysis demographic/clinical variable IPQ-R Identity Opinion continuous variable . Mann-Whitney U-test Kruskal-Wallis Chi-Squared test use IPQ-R Cause ordinal variable . One-way ANOVA LSD post hoc multiple comparison test also use compare mean adherence index IPQ-R Identity Opinion continuous variable . Kruskal-Wallis Chi-Squared test use IPQ-R Cause ordinal variable . Values p ≤0.05 consider statistically significant .
